hints.content:
There are $\purpleD{53}$ cars in the parking lot. $\blueE{29}$ cars left after the first movie. 

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d031e8949dbae322a598704c5ba20c332a70e480)

$\purpleD{53}-\blueE{29}=\maroonD{24}$

There were $\maroonD{24}$ cars left after the first movie.

Then $\tealE{7}$ cars left after the second movie.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7d62da835376b521cb018d4e672420c3cd821ae6)

$\maroonD{24}-\tealE{7}=\goldE{17}$
The parking lot has $\goldE{17}$ cars left.

question.content:
There are $53$ cars parked at the movie theatre. $29$ cars drove away after the first movie. $7$ cars drove away after the second movie. 

**How many cars are still in the parking lot after the second movie?**  

[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] cars
